title: Drawing, Design for Light in Chapter Room, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY, ca. 1890
title_raw: Design for Light in Chapter Room, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY
medium: Brush and wash, gouache, graphite on paper mounted on tan illustration board
signed: in pen and black ink, verso: Miss A C Morse
inscribed:
in graphite, recto, bottom: Light in Chapter Room / (1 of this)

in pen and black ink, verso: Return to / Miss A C Morse / 88 Morton / B'klyn / no. 53

trace of Colwell label
description: Tall lunette window of blue and yellow glass with central petals in pink.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Light in Chapter Room, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY, ca. 1890. Brush and wash, gouache, graphite on paper mounted on tan illustration board. 
Gift of Alice C. Morse. 2009-6-6
